# Community & Contributing

This directory contains community guidelines, issue templates, and contribution standards for the Cadence project.

## Files

### Core Guidelines

- **[SECURITY.md](SECURITY.md)** - Security policy and vulnerability reporting
- **[CODE_OF_CONDUCT.md](CODE_OF_CONDUCT.md)** - Community standards and expectations
- **[CONTRIBUTING.md](CONTRIBUTING.md)** - How to contribute to Cadence

### Issue Templates

Located in `ISSUE_TEMPLATE/`:
- **[bug_report.md](ISSUE_TEMPLATE/bug_report.md)** - Report bugs and issues
- **[feature_request.md](ISSUE_TEMPLATE/feature_request.md)** - Suggest new features
- **[documentation.md](ISSUE_TEMPLATE/documentation.md)** - Suggest documentation improvements

### Templates

- **[pull_request_template.md](pull_request_template.md)** - Pull request guidelines
- **[FUNDING.yml](FUNDING.yml)** - Sponsorship and funding links

### Workflows

Located in `workflows/`:
- **[test.yml](workflows/test.yml)** - Automated testing on push and PR

## Contact

Questions or need to report something?

- **Email**: [hey@codemeapixel.dev](mailto:hey@codemeapixel.dev)
- **Twitter/X**: [@CodeMeAPixel](https://twitter.com/CodeMeAPixel)
- **GitHub**: Open an issue in the repository

## Code of Conduct

All interactions with this project are governed by our [Code of Conduct](CODE_OF_CONDUCT.md). Please familiarize yourself with it before participating.

## Getting Help

- Check the [README](../README.md) for usage instructions
- See [CONTRIBUTING.md](CONTRIBUTING.md) for development setup
- Review existing [GitHub Issues](https://github.com/CodeMeAPixel/cadence/issues) before asking

## Contributing

We welcome contributions from everyone! Please read [CONTRIBUTING.md](CONTRIBUTING.md) to get started.
